meanings.sent1: The artist's painting looked uninspired and dull.
meanings.sent2: Her uninspired choice of colors made the room seem boring.
meanings.sent3: The uninspired design of the cake made it look like a plain white box.
meanings.sent4: The speech was so uninspired that it put everyone to sleep.
meanings.sent5: The book's plot was so uninspired that it was forgettable.

meanings.sent1: He gave an uninspired performance during the play.
meanings.sent2: She felt uninspired to go for a run on a rainy day.
meanings.sent3: The team's uninspired effort resulted in a loss.
meanings.sent4: The students' uninspired response to the project disappointed the teacher.
meanings.sent5: The chef's uninspired cooking left the customers unsatisfied.

meanings.definition: Not influenced or affected by divine inspiration.
meanings.sent1: The poet's work was uninspired by any spiritual influence.
meanings.sent2: The architect's design was uninspired by any religious beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The singer's uninspired lyrics had no connection to divine inspiration.
meanings.sent4: The painting was uninspired, devoid of any hint of divine inspiration.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's movements seemed uninspired, lacking any touch of divine inspiration.
